radiographic_examinations.findings: Severe degenerative arthritis according to the modified Arnold and Hilgartner classification of hemophiliac arthropathy, advanced joint-space narrowing on the ulnar side, complete collapse on the radial side, substantial elbow deformity, especially of the radial head with large osteophytes.
Proper positioning of the implant with no signs of loosening.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: At the one and two-year follow-up visits, radiographs showed a satisfactory position of the implant with no signs of loosening.
